name: Catnip (Prinsessa)
description:
Hyperactive kitty catnip playground! 🙀

REGARDING DOWNLOADS

The embed and download associated with the page are for web and Windows only respectively because those were minimal requirements and I only had five minutes left to upload.

Therefore the web build is also hosted here, so you can actually play it if you're not on Windows:

http://ava.levelism.com/Catnip

I also uploaded Mac and Linux builds:

http://ava.levelism.com/Catnip/Catnip_Mac.zip
http://ava.levelism.com/Catnip/Catnip_Linux.zip

(I'm having trouble with my uploads, but hopefully these links should work soon!)

"POST-JAM" BUILDS

Actually only about an hour post-jam, but I was in the middle of adding sound as the time ran out, so I thought I'd finish that up anyway and provide it as a separate Itch project if you want to play with more sound effects and proper balance! There was even an audio bug in the jam build due to a misplaced semicolon. 😝

https://prinsessa.itch.io/catnip-post-jam

These builds recommended if you're not playing to rate in the jam!!

 Credits
  • Ava Skoog
  • Foley from zapsplat.com
  • Font Good Dog by Fonthead Design
  • Font Grandstander Clean by Tyler Finck
  • Font FontAwesome for the hand icons
